EmailTemplate.name: BookKeeping Consult Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Bookkeeping Consult Email
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Anderson Processing Team
Hello {!Account.Name},
Thank you for your interest in bookkeeping services with Anderson!
Our consultations are designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of what you can expect from our bookkeeping team and inform you of what the bookkeeping team will need from you for you to effectively utilize our services.
What to have available during your consult and why:
Your structure We will be going over what type of business you are doing and how your entities are taxed in order to provide you a quote for bookkeeping services Important information to provide includes:
Entity Name
Tax Status C-Corp S-Corp Partnership Disregarded to 1040
Last Tax Return filed Fiscal year end Organization year
What type of services you are looking for This will help us prepare a quote specific to you
Service Options are: Monthly In-House Bookkeeping Chart of Account Set-Up Monthly In-House Bookkeeping Supervisor Review Clean up of Existing Books Quickbooks Online Subscription Only
If you are doing any type of bookkeeping at the moment, please let us know at the time of your consultation We will discuss how to transfer that information over to our software for us to proceed with your bookkeeping
Any package(s) you have purchased to be used for bookkeeping services Note: If you purchased units, we can use them for bookkeeping for the time being. We are moving away from those units and packages for bookkeeping across the board. Purchasing a package does not automatically get you set up with bookkeeping services.
Any questions you have regarding your bookkeeping
By scheduling a consultation, you are stating you agree to our Terms & Conditions. Once your consultation is scheduled, our onboarding team will reach out to you on the date and time that you choose. Please provide us the phone number you can be reached at.
Please keep in mind that if you need to cancel or reschedule, you should give at least 48 hours notice as there are many other clients interested in bookkeeping services that we need to schedule calls with. Should you fail to keep that appointment without prior notice, you will be placed at the end of the queue and will need to reschedule.
We will discuss our services, pricing, software options and any other questions you have at the time of our consultation. If you have any questions in the meantime, please reach out to bookkeepingadmins@andersonadvisors.com.
Best Regards,
https://na2.docusign.net/Member/PowerFormSigning.aspx?PowerFormId=083c84ba-c8c7-45ff-89e2-66f890214033&env=na2&Applicant_Email={!Account.E_Mail__c}&Applicant_UserName={!Account.Name}&Applicant_Phone={!Account.Phone}&Applicant_FirstName={!Account.First_Name__c}&Applicant_LastName={!Account.Last_Name__c}&Applicant_AccountID={!Account.Id}&SourceID={!Account.Id}&CCRM =Decision Maker~Signer 1&CCTM =Decision Maker~Signer&DST=a2e2cd02-f11e-4c8c-a830-c9f2b6564a9e&LA=0&LF=0&OCO=Tag
Thank you, Anderson Business Advisors, LLC
